    • Method Detail

      • transform

        public DataFrame transform(DataFrame frame)
        Averages the data at each time step. For each time step, each layer's x,y domain data is averaged into a value for each layer.
        Specified by:
        transform in interface DataTransformer
        Parameters:
        frame - the data to transform
        Returns:
        the data averaged for each time step.
